item.title: Consuming protein at breakfast may aid in weight loss
item.description:
Source: CSIRO. Protein in the morning could help with weight management. Increasing protein intake, particularly during breakfast, might be crucial for healthy weight loss, as per a new report from CSIRO. The report, titled “Protein Balance: New concepts for protein in Weight Management,” supports the CSIRO Total Wellbeing Diet for weight management. It highlights recent scientific findings suggesting that consuming at least 25 grams of protein per main meal can help regulate hunger and boost muscle metabolism...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/consuming-protein-at-breakfast-may-aid-in-weight-loss/
